PRESS

For press inquiries please reach out at press@the-vines.com

"Elite Traveler: In a tasting room at Casanova di Neri Winery in Montalcino, Italy, members of international private wine club The Vines look like mad scientists, sitting at round tables, pouring unfinished Sangiovese wines from three vineyards into test tubes, then into carafes, perfecting their blends to produce their small-batch Brunellos, one of Italy’s most prestigious reds."

“Robb Report: 12 Luxurious Gifts for the Wine Snob on Your Shopping List”

“Fortune Magazine: Travel the World and Bottle Your Own Wine While You’re at It”

“Town & Country: This Winemaking Membership Lets You Feel Like a Vineyard Owner”

"New York Times: A group of us will be in Argentina at least once a year for harvest or blending. Our investment has become a lot more than just owning a vineyard. It has enriched friendships, created new ones and established a place that we now call home."
